category.name: Rich Client
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: ChangeItemRevision_ItemRevision_default_relation
preference.preference_description: When creating a change object in the context of an item revision, specifies the relation the item revision has to the created change item revision. The default is that the item revision is a problem item, as shown in the figure for a change request. Valid Values: Any valid change management relation.
